lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I saw the Opra Winfrey show which inspired me to try to make a difference for people trying to improve their lives.

lender.name: Celia
lender.loan_because: I want to see women especially reach their goals,dreams and become financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: I own a yarn shop in a small rural town where women mostly come everyday andknit or crochet and talk about their lives good and bad. I sell relaxation and creativity!

lender.name: Erum
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and thankful for everything I have and want to give others hope and an opportunity to make it in this world.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I can help other people.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I believe being involved in international giving is the way to Peace.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Customer Service representaive for a major utility. I help people to make arrangements to pay their bills and take care of other concerns they may have.

lender.name: The Haider Family
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and would hope to make a difference to those in need.

lender.name: LeAnn
lender.loan_because: I believe in small steps for big change
lender.occupational_info: I work in online retail as Web Producer.

lender.name: Passing it on
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and want to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their money

lender.name: aarti
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves. I want to help business owners keep their dreams alive.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hotel and make reservations.

lender.name: Nga
lender.loan_because: I want to help families who want to help themselves. Being Vietnamese, my family struggled to make it. I know all we ever wanted was a bit of help, not a hand out.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: It is fun to help those who are trying to help themselves! It takes so little to assist someone to change their lives!!

lender.name: Mike & Debbie
lender.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Oil And Natural Gas Production in Canada.

lender.name: www.omg-thatsit.com
lender.loan_because: One day we all need some help to stand up and continue walking on our path... And I hope we can make a difference on this man made crazy planet.
lender.occupational_info:
Image tells more than 1000 words. Please check my website... Please FireFox broweser.
Soleil's Photography www.omg-thatsit.com

lender.name: Madhavi
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed throughout my life.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and am able to help. Everyone needs some help sometime. I have witnessed what a helping hand can do in my life. It makes a world of difference when someone has faith in you. I want to help someone else fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university. My job is to plan the university president's social, athletic and cultural events. I guess you can say I plan parties!

lender.name: The Schneiders
lender.loan_because: we believe in Kiva and believe in helping people who take the initiative to help themselves

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I enoying giving and look forward to watching hard working individuals get a head with a little help. It is kind of like give them a fish or show them how to fish.
lender.occupational_info: I work with start up compaines with their marketing and product developement and also teach part time.

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: It is imperative to provide opportunities
lender.occupational_info: I work in the area of international environmental policy, focusing upon Canada's positions and obligations under the UNEP Stockholm Convention and the UNECE Convention on Long-range Transboundary Air Pollution

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to travel to many places in the world where poverty is a way of live. It helps to know how to help if only a bit.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: As I have traveled around the world I have come to realize how fortunate I am. I hope my small loans can help others.

lender.name: Ann W
lender.loan_because: When I loan, I feel I make a difference in someone's future as well as my own.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of keeping the yard and property of the apartment complex where I live. I keep public areas clean and safe, replace lights, care for trees and shrubs, pick up trash and respond to the concerns of tenants.

lender.name: Deborah and Kelsey
lender.loan_because: We have so much ourselves and it is amazing to see just how little it really takes from each person to hopefully make a real difference in someone else's life. Kiva helps to make this possible.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what the universe has provided me and I want to make a difference in the world, no matter how big or small.
lender.occupational_info: One of my life objectives is to show people that we can all make a difference. Giving Kiva gift certificates to my friends provides them the opportunity to see and decide how they can make a difference in other peoples' lives. Hopefully, they will pay it forward.

lender.name: Joseph Battaglia
lender.loan_because: Everyone in the world deserves the opportunity to support their families! This is a small way I can help a fellow entrepreneur to succeed !
lender.occupational_info: I am a husband and a father of 2 children a daughter and a son. Here in Canada I arrange financing for the purchase of real estate.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I love helping women across the Globe become even better entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: I own 2 successful Internet Business' in the Real Estate Industry and the Self Help Industry.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who take the initiative to help themselves. I admire hardworking people and I like the Kiva organization because I am able to see where my money is going and after it is repaid, I can help another person. Brilliant!
lender.occupational_info: I am a kindergarten teacher in Carson, CA. I am also an Independent Beauty Consultant with Mary Kay Cosmetics.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO DO WHAT I CAN TO HELP.
lender.occupational_info: I AM A VENDOR OF NATIVE JEWELERY,I SELL AT NATIVE AMERICAN GATHERINGS,POW WOWS ,ETC.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: i am thankful for every blessing and chance i have been given and believe in giving that to others as i know the peace and hope it brought me.
lender.occupational_info: i work in a children's hospital with children who have been burned. i support them emotionally by explaining what happens in their care and being supportive when family can't be with them. i do whatever possible to make a scary place and medical experience more kid friendly and less stressful.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives and reduce the huge gap in living standards worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for trucking companies to help them move their freight.

lender.name: Jerry and Jacob
lender.loan_because: For the price of 5 coffees I can help somebody to better their life? It's a "No brainer" !!!

lender.name: adrienne
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling of giving. The life changing effects of this site is beauty for all that give to make a change for another person.

lender.name: Melodie
lender.loan_because: I want to assist people around the world to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker who enjoys painting, cooking, baking and my grandchildren.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Just want to help
lender.occupational_info: I suppy construction materials to the building industry

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone has the opportunity to make a difference in the world no matter how small, monetary or otherwise. My family has raised me to share with others and help others. As a small business owner, my father often made loans to employees and while he didn't always get the full amount back, he taught me about the importance of helping others so that they can first help themselves, then help others, as well. It is with the idea of paying it forward that I continue to help others through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher who works with young students on a daily basis- preparing them for their own great future.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to help someone.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it helps make the world a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I teach five and six year old Kindergarten students in a public school setting. It is a joy to come to work every day!

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I've had a lot of help the last few years from some great people who have helped me recover from the "big wind" destruction of four hurricanes.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the United States Government gathering information about the US economy. I go to small, medium and large businesses in order to get this information. I hear about their business struggles, plans, successes and failures in the course of my work.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: Someone loaned to me almost 10 years ago to start my business and I wanted to do that for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Sales Director in the field of cosmetics. I sell cosmetics directly to customers and I also share the same opportunity with other women and help them to build their own cosmetics business.

lender.name: marcel
lender.loan_because: I want to share my rich life and help people.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a school for business administration.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to help people advance in life. Everyone should have the chance.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe it's important for everyone to help others when they can. The amount doesn't matter, what matters is everyone reaching out to the extent that they are able.
lender.occupational_info: I managed retail stores for 20 years, currently I sell computer systems to retail stores.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because:
"Only through the act of giving can our feelings of powerlessness and separateness recede. For it is through this act of giving that we are awakened to the interconnectedness that binds us all and then we realize that giving to others is also giving to ourselves. And soon we too shall want for nothing." Eric A. DeCuir Jr. 2008
Quote I try to live by: A human being is part of the whole called by us universe , a part limited in time and space. We experience ourselves, our thoughts and feelings as something separate from the rest. A kind of optical delusion of consciousness. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us. Our task must be to free ourselves from the prison by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty... We shall require a substantially new manner of thinking if mankind is to survive." -Albert Einstein
lender.occupational_info: Research on the optical and electronic properties of semiconductors materials ;)

lender.name: Hubert
lender.loan_because: I would like to change your life and also want you to be in a position to change the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Lead Program Manager that manages a team consisting of Project Managers and Analysts.

lender.name: Steve & Laura
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help developing countries and entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very high paced with a lot of hours. Restaurant businesses are known for having the worst hours. I manage a team of employees from kitchen staff to front staff.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to work in a profession that I enjoy. I became a math teacher many years ago and it is a pleasure to do what you want in your adult life. I want others to understand that same sense of joy.
lender.occupational_info: After being a teacher for 13 years I became a school administrator. I have only worked at the high school level (14 - 18 year olds). In some countries I would called the Head Master or Director.

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: We are all connected, we are all human, and we all want the same things: security, better life for our children, love, happiness, to live with dignity.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: it matters.

lender.name: Dydric
lender.loan_because: I want to give hope to people and help those who are aspiring for a better future.
lender.occupational_info: making a difference through small everyday things

lender.name: brandon
lender.loan_because: I want to give back what the Almighty Lord has blessed my family with..
lender.occupational_info: My work involves computer communications around the world

lender.name: kyla and Jimmy
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:40 " Whenever you did one of these things to someone overlooked or ignored, that was meyou did it to me."

lender.name: cathy
lender.loan_because: It's nice to lend a hand to someone who can use one.

lender.name: maureen
lender.loan_because: this is a great idea and I'm happy to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a family farm, with the help of 1 son on the farm and 4 other children off the farm, but involved and owning animals. We milk 200 head of Brown Swiss, Holsteins, and Jerseys.

lender.name: monica
lender.loan_because: its fun.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: Helping others in any way, no matter how incremental, to become more self-sufficient is a way to change the world.

lender.name: FRANCINE
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle and never having friends to loan you money or to assist you. Sometimes you get lucky or you just pray with conviction to the Lord and then he certainly makes a way for whatever you need. I wish to support others who are unfortunate to have the life style they seek . We are all GOD's children and it is important to assist others as "his" instrument for the better in all.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business woman who has the passion to assist others. I believe that is what my calling is and I want to do this as a gift to those who have had their struggles as I have.

lender.name: Erick
lender.occupational_info: PC Technical support

lender.name: Don and Jim
lender.loan_because: We have met many Mexican people since moving here. They are lovely, honest and hard working people whom we will support in any way.
lender.occupational_info: A retired broadcaster turned retailer now living in Mexico and a retired telecommunications rep.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I know that even my small donations make a big difference in the lives of others and I trust Kiva completly. It is a great organization.
lender.occupational_info: I buy things and re-sell them on Ebay and also make jewelry that I try to sell at fairs and stores.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because:
I love micro-lending! And I love Kiva!
Recommended Reading:
Banker To The Poor: Micro-Lending and the Battle Against World Poverty by Muhammad Yunus, Founder of the Grameen Bank, Winner of the Nobel Peace Prize
Creating a World Without Poverty: Social Business and the Future of Capitalism by Muhammad Yunus
Give Us Credit by Alex Counts (1996) Muhammad Yunus mentions this book in Banker to the Poor on page 188. He says that it is the most fascinating storytelling he has ever read.
My Favorite Kiva Video - The LAPO Women of Nigeria: LAPO Women Say Their Thank You's - http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=20 or see it at YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gn3G2wc9bUc.

lender.name: Sindee
lender.loan_because: I want to give something back especially to help women working hard to make a better life for their children.
lender.occupational_info: Retired teacher and principal now volunteer teaching and helping older women.

lender.name: Kristie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: Helping people feels good and I'm grateful to be able to help in this way. I grew up in small businesses and I have my own small businesses. If I can assist someone in establishing or improving theirs, I'm all for it!
lender.occupational_info: I build websites and provide IT services to small business and residential clients. I also produce e-learning modules for delivery over the web and am a world traveler. I love my life!

lender.name: Kaytlyn
lender.loan_because: I want to support small businesses in my personal and professional work.
lender.occupational_info: I support small businesses in my own community, working one-on-one to help people start up their own websites and create business materials. I understand the passion, confidence and perserverance of small business owners.

lender.name: Michele Allen
lender.loan_because: owning my own business added to my happiness and security enormously. I want to help other people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I setup computers and teach small-business owners how to use them.

lender.name: greg
lender.loan_because: We all need a little now and then, for very little dollars I can help make a big difference in someone life. Especially in the life of a entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: Help families save for retirement

lender.name: Clifford
lender.loan_because: 'Credit is a Human Right' Muhammad Yunus
lender.occupational_info: Producer of grains -- canola, wheat, barley, oats

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: What seems like a small amount to me can make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: SUSAN
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have very little and are working hard to succeed.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and to make a positive difference.
lender.occupational_info: I started my own pet sitting service where I care for other people's pets while they're working or on vacation.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: people deserve a chance in providing a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are willing to help themselves. Kiva makes regifting a good thing...
lender.occupational_info: I provide technical support to cable television operators. I work for a cable equipment distributor that supplies everything from nuts and bolts to digital headend solutions.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: God has given me the gift of giving. "I am because we are; because we are, therefore I am."
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand and respect each other in the workplace.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I do accounting for one of the large movie studios.

lender.name: Anne Obradovich
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the change I want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying so that I might also build my own business, perhaps Kiva may help me one day to do so.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I loan funds to those in need, because at one time I was a person in need. Now that I am able to pay it forward I do so as much as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students who are disabled by using visual arts to enable them to explore themselves and the wonderful world around them.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: I loan in gratitude for all the blessings I've received.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I was in poverty rasing 2 children alone and someone extended their hand to help me. I am just passing it forward. Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Air Force Jets.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: God gave me a gift when I was born. That gift was to Love Everyone on this Earth no matter what, religion, race, creed, color. I have been giving to strangers, family, friends all my life. I will give until the day God calls me home to rest. I love you.
lender.occupational_info: I work at two hospital's in Ilinois, doing patient registration, giving them the best service each and every day, with a beautiful smile and a great personality. I love helping people.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: it's a small flutter of a butterfly wing.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the World.
lender.occupational_info: Part owner of a Century 21 office.

lender.name: Shane
lender.occupational_info: I am contracted out by our department of fisheries or industry to take marine fisheries stock assessment or complete marine habitat environmental assessments.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: Everyone who is willing to work for their dreams deserves support to achieve it as I have done myself. I'm very excited to have this opportunity to assist others in their success for their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for city government and am assigned to lower income neighborhoods where I can help improve the lives of people by improving the neighborhoods that they live in. I work to bring new industrial companies, commerical businesses, and the development of new housing to a community that has not seen new development in many years. I also assist in the development of new schools and parks for the residents.

lender.name: CANDI
lender.loan_because: I admire anyone who takes the initiative to make their life better by working hard and needs some help to accomplish their goal.

lender.name: Yasmina
lender.loan_because:
It is just beautiful to see how easy it is to make this world a better place with little love and little money every bit counts.
Also, I remember my grandparents telling us similar stories about having to borrow money or trade certain services to survive during World War II.
We are blessed so lets share the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: Administrator

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I once worked as a volunteer in Kenya: Nairobi, Kisumu and Ugunja

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.occupation: Flint River Ranch Pet Food Distributor
lender.loan_because: I know that Father God wants us all to help each other! What a Blessing this is for everyone involved!
lender.occupational_info: I sell Safe Dog & Cat food. We have had many recalls on pet food here in America. And many pets have died due to unsafe food.

lender.name: Charity
lender.loan_because: I want this world to be a better place, and I think this is one way to help that happen. I believe that, as a civilization, we now have the resources and technology to bring everyone on earth out of extreme poverty. Not to do so would be unethical and short-sighted in terms of global safety. This is why I support the United Nations Millenium Development Goals, and why I loan on Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I work on projects to prevent, cleanup or contain pollution to help protect people and the environment.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have people believe in me when I needed it. I have also seen first hand what a difference such loans can make to people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: Assisting small scale dairy farmers transition into value added production and bring their products into the marketplace.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I love empowering people to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: service & hospitality industry

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I love to help others fulfill their dreams while providing an income for themselves and their families. And it just plain feels good! :-)
lender.occupational_info: I turned a passion into a business - selling collector grade crystal and mineral specimens. Yes, I sell rocks! :-)

lender.name: Puy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Marion Eichler
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a great way to help hardworking people, who do not have access to the same financial resources as we do. Hopefully this small effort on my part will make a difference in their lives !!!

lender.name: Shawn & Lance
lender.loan_because: We feel lucky and fortunate to be able to loan and to be in the company of such giving souls. Thank You Kiva and to everyone who makes this happen.
lender.occupational_info: I am president of a company that owns comercial real estate and a couple retail businesses. Primarily a jewelry store where i am chief designer.

lender.name: Michael Kocher
lender.loan_because: Right now circumstances and choices leave me unable to travel internationally and help people directly. In fact, because of my line of work, my interaction is most likely to be decidedly unpeaceful. I want to try and do what I can to help, above and beyond what else is possible from home.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a United States Marine and serve my country as much as I can. I'm also a University student pursuing a degree in Politics, with an intention to someday go into political consulting, policy analysis and international governmental consulting, hopefully building enough influence to stop the sorts of conflicts I currently work in.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I believe God wants His people to love and care for one another. It's exciting to imagine how these businesses will flourish.

lender.name: Alain Wong
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Technical Support Engineer in the Silicon Valley (California). My job is to help customers resolve technical issues with their internet equipment.

lender.name: Adri
lender.loan_because: I love to see others plant/grow and flourish their dreams.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others; especially single women supporting children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker. I help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: Some one has helped me in my endevors.
lender.occupational_info: Performing Arts Stuido Also Globalinx .net

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: It's right to "pay it forward"

lender.name: cheryl
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a hand up and not just a hand out..

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I believe in the model of microfinance as a means to lift people out of poverty.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I am happy to be making a difference.

lender.name: P. Leslie
lender.loan_because: I love people and I am a natural born giver, helping and giving is what I live for!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the medical field, so I am use to helping people

lender.name: Long
lender.loan_because: It make me happy when I can help some one in need a helping hand.

lender.name: Mike & Olga
lender.loan_because: I can and that I believe in lending the rod and bait over a giving a basket of fish.
lender.occupational_info: I design and code business web applications.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings and honour the memory of those who would be doing wonderful things themselves if they were still with us.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: We here in the United States are so fortunate to have what we have. I think we should all give back to others in need around the world.
lender.occupational_info: You have to love numbers........

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a better and more stable place. Plus, it's just the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work on various short term projects for various organizations.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone become successful in their life. I feel so fortunate to live the life I have and would like to know that if I were on the other end someone would do this for me.

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: I understand how important is to give back part of what life has gifted Us with.
lender.occupational_info: I own a Computer and Business Consulting Company for Minority Micro Eentrepreneurs ( www.americapsi.com ; www.vikamall.com). I am also a Licensed Real Estate Salesperson-ABR and Loan Officer. I worked 17 years at PETROPERU as a maintenance supervisor and Planner/Coordinator for an oil field and Natural Gas Plants.

lender.name: Sajad
lender.loan_because: would love to help someone....

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It feels great to give and support other entrepreneurs. I love how Kiva is set up where a little bit of money goes a long way.

lender.name: Radito M. Anoran
lender.loan_because: Today we all countries are affected by global crisis, so I want to have a small business of my own to support my family and other relative.
lender.occupational_info: low income.

lender.name: Baffour
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I made this loan because Obuasi is where I was born and raised. I know the market. I could't believe that this lady from my town was on Kiva trying to expand her business. I did not hesitate to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the phone company, Verizon in corporate benefits.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed. I saw much poverty living in Mexico and we truly have no idea what it is to "go without " in our society.

lender.name: Sunderta Kaur
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner who has been blessed with great success. I find it so exciting to be able to support other entrepeneurs like myself. Spiritually I believe in tithing to others who are demonstrating that which I want to manifest more of in my own life. What a great opportunity Kiva presents for me to be able to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Drug and Alcohol Counselor, a Kundalini Yoga Teacher and a healer.

lender.name: Ugen Peden
lender.loan_because: we can secure a family's financial happiness....
lender.occupational_info: Insurance,Retirement & Estate Planning.....!

lender.name: Corinna
lender.loan_because: Circulating kindness and giving in the hopes that we can all be more equal someday. To truly know this gift can really make a difference in someone's life and their family.

lender.name: Rosli
lender.loan_because: I want to see world without poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard and receive payment monthly.

lender.name: MARIA
lender.loan_because: Thru Kiva, I help others to fulfill their dreams and others to survive

lender.name: Lori & Allison
lender.loan_because: It will make a difference in the lives of those who receive the loans.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Easy and fun way to make a difference without paying for huge management fees to the usual "charities"
lender.occupational_info: I drive a big Semi full of mail around St.Paul Minnesota. I have been driving big trucks for 42 years. Fun job and great to be outdoors.

lender.name: Marguerite
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is the best idea/way to enable the third world to improve their lot and create autonomy.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: Because I believe that the greatest gift you can give is to help someone be able to support themselves and their family. THIS IS A AMAZING PROGRAM!!!! I am so glad that I found this site on Thanksgiving Day 2007. Thank you Oprah again for helping to spread the word...and to the Founders of Kiva for their passion to create such a powerful "Giving & Receiving Tool" to the world...May God Bless You. Sheri Sharman
lender.occupational_info: I am a proffessional Network Marketer that loves teaching people how to become successful in all areas of their lives. I have spent the past 20 years traveling around the world and doing seminars teaching simple ways to truly be "Living & Loving Life!!!"

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to get help from my family, and want to "be there" for someone else. Sharing helps the world go around.
lender.occupational_info: I rent housing to people. I like to sew, and create new things. I believe farmers are the beginning of a healthy economy.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance....

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: It is important to me to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a US Army Nurse. I try never to forget how fortunate I am to wake up everyday with adequate amounts of: clean water, food, clothing, and shelter. Few in the world can boast such luxuries.

lender.name: christina
lender.loan_because: I Can.

lender.name: Julie & Andy
lender.loan_because: Because we can.
lender.occupational_info: Answer calls for the police, fire, abulance. Julie works with adults with developmental disabilities

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help make computers.

lender.name: carolyn
lender.loan_because: life is so terribly short not to help where you can.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I know little things make big changes in the world.

lender.name: ramon
lender.loan_because: i love being a giver...
lender.occupational_info: soldier

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and a small amount can help
lender.occupational_info: I am a coordinator for research projects related to kidney and pancreas transplant. I see patients on a regular basis. I also record pertinent data that eventually is analyzed.

lender.name: Trauma Queen
lender.occupation: Roller Derby Skater / IT Process Engineer
lender.loan_because: I have a connection to single parents and I want to do what I can to help other mothers and fathers achieve big things so they can provide for their children. We may not all have the same opportunities, but we all equally strive to do our best for our families.
lender.occupational_info: I am employed at Pfizer in Quality/Compliance. I am also a skater with the Brandywine Roller Girls.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I can tell the sincerity of the founders when I saw them at the Oprah show. The organization is so powerful in that it reaches the poorest people and allows average people like me to help in small ways.
lender.occupational_info: I now managed my own business, a home health care office in Canton, OH. We provide caregivers to help the elderly with everyday living activities and provide companionship in their own homes.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I feel it helps those who want to better their there situation and gives them a chance to take care of there families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: Always cleaning something

lender.name: Claude
lender.loan_because:
anyone who is able should help those in need. I'm trying to make a difference in this world in the hope that those who see my good deeds will praise my Father in heaven.
matt. 5:16

lender.loan_because: I want to help others change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help get environmental engineers get trained yearly.

lender.name: FutureDuty

lender.name: Doc DC
lender.loan_because: I see people who wants to change their lives for the better, and I want to see and help them make that change.

lender.name: G.W.
lender.loan_because: I Understand, what it's like be in need. I care.
lender.occupational_info: ~I wish you all success and happiness.

lender.occupational_info: I work for elders, to help them stay strong and independent; to help them with Plan B when independence is no longer possible.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I believe in people. I believe if they have the opportunity to succeed, the drive to accomplish, anything can be.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from work, but try to help and volunteer wherever I see a need.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I opened my own business in March 2007. Iwould not have been able to do this without assisstance from my father. He gave me the opportunity to reach for a dream that I have had. My business has been successful and now I want to help someone else have the opportunity to reach their dream. It's time for me to "pay it forward"
lender.occupational_info: I help others in my community to recover from physical problems or injuries. My wife works for the county recreation department and heads Special Olympics in our area. My 2 children attend grade school.

lender.name: Rocky Coney Island
lender.loan_because: It's one of the greatest gift in the world. It is a great feeling to help others.

lender.name: Diann
lender.loan_because: I find that when I have money available, the best place to put it to good use right away is on Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: I've been very blessed in my life. When I was at my lowest point someone reached out to me. It's all about doing the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work with women recovering from addiction.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I feel like God put me on this earth to help others it is up to us to help those in need
lender.occupational_info: I have retired but still do a few things to keep me busy. I just started doing direct sales and am selling for TomBoy Tools. What a great product for women.

lender.loan_because: we like the idea of helping working people continue to be independent and the Kiva cycle of once the money is repaid, loaning it to another working individual.

it offers hope. God has blessed me abundantly and I want to share the blessings.

lender.loan_because: My daughters grow up in prosperity, and I want other people to live in prosperity as well

lender.loan_because: those who have should give back

lender.name: Lisa

lender.occupational_info: I work running/training/marketing/showing/breeding/ all a round everything at The Royal Lusitano, a Lusitano horse breeding Farm I'm also the co-Founder and Executive Director of the Chicago Royal Equestrian Arts Foundation

lender.name: Hans & Sabine
lender.loan_because: ...we are grateful for our standard of living and because we want to help people to increase theirs.
lender.occupational_info: We are an attorney and an accountant in the financing and real estate sector.

lender.name: janis
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one and the more I travel the Globe the more I realize that we are all more alike than we are different!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a service industry and service is how I express the love I feel in my heart. Life is so good and it is a gift.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: i loan because it makes a difference in someones life; someone who can't help themselves, also because it makes you feel good about yourself

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help people. I lead a very blessed life and I like being able to impact the lives of people who aren't as fortunate as I am.

lender.name: Titia & Jan
lender.loan_because: it's a positive way to make a small contribution to someone's dreams and goals

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: i am trying to get money to help the child i sponcered in honduras, she is poor, her father abandoned her and her mother and sister.
lender.occupational_info: i work 60 hours a week trying to sell dog products to help get money for my sponsored child. her mother only makes $150.00 a month, but needs alot more

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I get to! It makes my heart sing. Mahatma Gandhi said, "You must be the change you wish to see in the world." Jesus said, "It is more blessed to give than to receive." And when I'm down to my last dime, I still have much more than so many people in the world. Because the return is priceless. Thank you so much!
lender.occupational_info: My massage work is focused primarily on chiropractic patients and cancer patients. My goal is to compliment the highest quality health care and maximize every body's health potential.

lender.name: Jyoti
lender.loan_because: Having the ability to transform someone's life for the better is awesome.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves researching new Medicines that can prevent or cure illnesses. With my efforts, I hope I can improve patients' lives.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place, one person at a time

lender.name: Staffan
lender.loan_because: I'm privileged enough to have the possibility.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Telenor Sweden with web analysis

lender.name: Jacques
lender.loan_because: I consider myself fortunate to have access to lots of things that half the population of the world can only dream of. Unfortunately, I've been diagnosed with cancer one year ago; I'm trying to do as much as I can until I can't be of any help anymore.
lender.occupational_info: Canada is a bilingual country - English and French. Lots of translation is required between these two languages- and that's what I do. Like you, I'm a small entrepreneur.

lender.name: shelley
lender.loan_because: It is time for me to give back. I was looking for a way to give and felt that Kiva was very successful at helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I schedule the flight crews for a national airline and have just graduated from nursing school. I work in the operations center of the airline and part time in a hospital.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: because I can help others....we like to give back to our community locally as well as globally too!

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy thing to do. I owned a business and know the struggles it can take. You can help these people for so little. Its fun helping and watching them grow with little effort.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and maintain automobiles. I enjoy spending time with my family and friends. Life can be hard at times. These are the people whom can help you through it. So if someone is in need and you can help, then why not?

lender.name: Carol & Michael
lender.loan_because: We support anyone who prioritizes a better quality of life within their community!

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: research studies for people with bone and joint problems

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who work hard to help themselves.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: We are all connected. Microlending gives everyone an opportunity to change the world by lifting it out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: It reminds me there is goodness and the potential for success in everyone of us.
lender.occupational_info: I help a company in the cell phone industry be more efficient and find ways to save money. I also look for opportunities to produce more with the same or less effort.

lender.name: Moneris PMS&S #1
lender.loan_because: We want to give people the seed money to better their lives and communities
lender.occupational_info: We are a team of project management professionals for a large Canadian payment processor

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I loaned as a holiday gift on behalf of my team at work. They are extremely giving people and care deeply about the well-being of others. I cannot think of a better gift to reflect all of my co-workers than to benefit children and their family.
lender.occupational_info: We strive to ensure the well-being and protection of children.

lender.name: Karl-Johan
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Insurance Advisor for property, marine and travel insurnace.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help others in less fortunate countries that are in need of a loan to improve their situation.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life and want to give back.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: Small businesses help build communities of people. It is a wonderful feeling to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small shop

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: ..of the sense of global connectedness.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct custody evaluations for the Courts in cases of contested custody.

lender.name: Morgan & Olivia
lender.loan_because: Because we want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: We are students.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Even though I make very little money myself I know that there are so many people less fortunate than I am. I want to make a difference in the world and make a large impact on improving someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I drive school children back and forth to school every day. I am their bus driver, their mother, their nurse, their teacher and their friend all in one.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to give when I can. I like the idea that just a little bit of money from me can dramatically change another person's life!

lender.name: Ken & Leslie Hines
lender.loan_because: First of all - I loan because it is an easy way to help someone that needs a little support to get a couple of rungs higher on the ladder.
lender.occupational_info: I work with MOSS 2007 and build some really cool applications. However, there's little excitement in that and lending a stranger money puts a smile on my face.

lender.name: Azra
lender.loan_because: We are all connected. Every one of us has the capacity to achieve greatness.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to make a difference in someone elses lives and in the world...to be a part of that makes the world more beautiful...to be blessed is to remember to be grateful.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in Pittsburgh and will be taking care of critically ill patients in a Neuro ICU.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I wanted to make a difference by joining the Marines to help people in other countries with my profession. Now I want to take an alternate approach and help people who need that extra boost to succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I love to travel and explore different countries and cultures. I am fascinated with learning about how people live and how much we are all alike around the world.

lender.name: Veronica & Eric
lender.loan_because: We believe in and have a passion for entrepreneurship and philanthropy.
lender.occupational_info: We are the founders of a website dedicated to connecting members of the African Diaspora. Our goal is to blur the lines of our current separation by eliminating myth and stigma and replacing it with the combination of our combined knowledge and talents.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world. ~Anne Frank
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my children and run the family household.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: My life is so blessed. I cannot ever know how difficult life must be in a developing country compared to living in the US. Here we can turn on a light switch and pretty much be guarenteed that we will have light, we can pretty much gaurentee that when we drive to a grocerie store, we can get food, we can flush, we can shower, and we take it for granted. To complain about almost ANYTHING in the US, is to not appreciate how hard the rest of the world has it.
lender.occupational_info: I teach riding (horses) and own a small commerical boat harbor. I live on the water and the old adage "if your are lucky enough to live on the water, you are lucky enough" pretty much says it all.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I have seen first hand, what a small act of goodwill can do for an individual. Whether it is a smile towards a sick child or helping out a farmer in the fields. I have the ability to smile and to lend a hand, and now, I have the ability to give.
lender.occupational_info: I educate people about HIV/AIDS and how to keep themselves healthy.

lender.name: joyce
lender.loan_because: It empowers people grow their life and community.
lender.occupational_info: Business owner self employed for many years

lender.name: Terry & Yasemin
lender.occupational_info: Our mission is to make loans to women from the Turkic states. We are still waiting for the day when a partner opens up in Turkey.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe one small act can make a difference

lender.name: Drew & Robin
lender.loan_because: We want to help others by giving what we can

lender.name: Ella
lender.loan_because: its a fun way to learn about other cultures and other ways of life.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: We have so much and many in the world have so little. If I can help someone help themselves get ahead and be able to look after their families then it is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer by profession however I am now retired from practising the law. i devote my time to my family, volunteer work, singing with two choirs in Ottawa and doing some songwriting and recording of inspirational music.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Empowerment is life
lender.occupational_info: Creating gardens for people's residences. I love my job!!

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: it's the best feeling in the world!! :)!!! I'm not rich or even ''financially secure', but I believe everyone can make a difference and if there are people around the world trying to improve, I enjoy being a part of their success.

lender.name: Jaci
lender.loan_because: After traveling for the last 10 years, I've seen how much we have, as US citizens, and how fortunate we are. I enjoy seeing how others live, and would like to help people have better lives.

lender.name: BEVERLY
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are trying to help themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve their tax problems when they need professional assistance

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.occupational_info: I'm a university professor.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship gives people the power to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur who starts technology companies that mostly help other entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It gives me satifaction to help those who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach communications.

lender.name: kathy
lender.loan_because: I am physically unable to do jobs but i can give back to those who can physically do the jobs and who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: My work is helping those who are in need .

lender.name: ROGET!
lender.loan_because: Oprah made me do it.
lender.occupational_info: Sales and Marketing

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love to see others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I sail around the world on cargo ships

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have been blessed with a great life and want to pass that on to others.
lender.occupational_info: Along with being a full tim wife and student, I teach math and writing skills to special needs kids at a local elementary school.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who wants to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: My work is challenging yet very enjoyable

lender.name: Ceilidh
lender.occupation: Managing Partner of a PR firm and entrepreneur

lender.name: bridget
lender.loan_because: I love to hear the individual stories and want to support entrprenuerial dreams of others.

lender.name: Jim and Robin
lender.loan_because: we want to help those in need who want to make better futures for themselves and the people around them.
lender.occupational_info: Jim is a director at a large retirement facility. Robin is an assistant to an eye doctor

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: The loans provide a means for these hard working entrepeneurs to build up their businesses and generate more income to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I school my children at home and provide them with lots of love.

lender.name: Georgia
lender.loan_because: To give others a helping hand to achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: RV Park (campground)

lender.name: Pavlov
lender.loan_because: We must help each other anyway we are able.

lender.name: Faridah
lender.loan_because: Mr. Clinton's book, "Giving" influenced me to be sure that I find ways to share with others. Kiva strikes me as an excellent addition to my other activities, and to make a personal contribution to someone else's success.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to be sure that women and people of color have equal access to jobs in the company that I am employed by.
